Napier repeat sex offender Denham Harber-Jones back in prison after meeting girl for sex https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/napier-repeat-sex-offender-denham-harber-jones-back-in-prison-after-meeting-girl-for-sex/I7CU4Z27WRBKDDGOBDFNUEZLUY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/napier-repeat-sex-offender-denham-harber-jones-back-in-prison-after-meeting-girl-for-sex/I7CU4Z27WRBKDDGOBDFNUEZLUY/ Ric StevensHe has been jailed again and will remain on the sex offender register for life. Photo / Instagram
